UMP Sultra Naik Jadi Rp 2,5 Juta, Gubernur Minta Pengusaha Patuh
01 Nov 2019, 08:03 by Sitti Harlina


Foto: Sitti Harlina/detikcom

Kendari - Gubernur Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra), Ali Mazi mengumumkan kenaikan UMP Provinsi Sultra pada tahun 2020 mendatang. UMP Sultra naik menjadi Rp2.552.014,52 mengalami kenaikan sebesar Rp 200.144,17 atau 8,51%. Hal tersebut diumumkan di Kantor Gubernur Sultra, Jumat (1/11/2019).Selain mengumumkan UMP, ia juga menyampaikan kenaikan upah minimum sektor pertambangan dan penggalian provinsi Sultra tahun 2020 sebesar Rp 2.614.779,41 mengalami kenaikan sebesar Rp 205.066,56 atau 8,51% dan upah minimum sektor konstruksi provinsi Sultra tahun 2020 sebesar Rp 2.691.794,72 mengalami kenaikan sebesar Rp 219.106,56 atau 8,51%."Saya sampaikan nilai upah minimum tersebut berada di atas kebutuhan hidup layak tahun 2019," katanya. Ia juga mengimbau kepada seluruh pelaku usaha untuk menaati ketentuan kenaikan UMP yang telah disepakati. "UMP berlaku di seluruh provinsi Sultra terhitung sejak 1 Januari 2020. Kepada seluruh pelaku usaha saya imbau untuk menerapkan Peraturan Gubernur No 38 Tahun 2019 tentang penetapan upah minimum provinsi sultra dan upah minimum sektoral tahun 2020 demi prinsip keadilan sehingga dapat meningkatkan taraf hidup dan kesejahteraan kerja buruh dan keluarganya," imbaunya.Sementara itu untuk Kota Kendari, Kabupaten Kolaka dan Kabupaten Konawe Utara menunggu penetapan dari upah minimum masing-masing kabupaten/kota yang akan diumumkan selambat-lambatnya pada tanggal 21 November mendatang. Southeast Sulawesi UMP Increases to Rp 2.5 Million, Governor Asks Entrepreneurs to Obey
Nov 01 2019, 08:03 by Sitti Harlina


Photo: Sitti Harlina / detikcom

Kendari - Southeast Sulawesi (Sultra) Governor Ali Mazi announced the increase in the Southeast Sulawesi Province UMP in 2020. Southeast Sulawesi UMP increased to Rp2,552,014.52, an increase of Rp 200,144.17 or 8.51%. This was announced at the Southeast Sulawesi Governor's Office on Friday (11/01/2019). In addition to announcing the UMP, he also conveyed the increase in the minimum wage in the mining and quarrying province of Southeast Sulawesi in 2020 to Rp 2,614,779.41 an increase of Rp 205,066.56 or 8.51% and the Southeast Sulawesi provincial construction sector minimum wage in 2020 amounting to Rp 2,691,794.72 an increase of Rp 219,106.56 or 8.51%. "I submit the value of the minimum wage is above the need for decent living in 2019," he said. He also appealed to all business actors to comply with the agreed UMP increase provisions. "The UMP is valid in all Southeast Sulawesi provinces as of January 1, 2020. To all businesspeople I urge to apply the Governor Regulation No. 38 of 2019 concerning the establishment of the Southeast Sulawesi provincial minimum wage and the sectoral minimum wage of 2020 for the sake of the principle of fairness so as to improve the standard of living and welfare of work. laborers and their families, "he said. Meanwhile, for Kendari City, Kolaka Regency and Konawe Utara Regency awaiting the determination of the minimum wages for each regency / city to be announced no later than November 21st.
